name: Oen Tech Co
description: Developer of a unified payment platform designed for nonprofits, campaigns, and organizations. The company's platform features include payments, fundraising, engagement, and compliance such as donations, e-commerce, ticketing, and subscriptions, easily setting up hosted fundraising websites and customizing call-to-actions, gaining insights into the target audience, and creating meaningful engagement based on the dynamic supporter database, enabling organizations to abide local laws and regulations.
one_liner: Developer of a unified payment platform designed for nonprofits, campaigns, and organizations. The company's platform features include payments, fundraising, engagement, and compliance such as donations, e-commerce, ticketing, and subscriptions, easily setting up hosted fundraising websites and customizing call-to-actions, gaining insights into the target audience, and creating meaningful engagement based on the dynamic supporter database, enabling organizations to abide local laws and regulations.
